# Short.io API & Salesforce Marketing Cloud - Encurtar Link
AMPScript que encurta links através da API do Shot.oi a ser utilizado no Salesforce Marketing Cloud

Documentação da API <a href="https://developers.short.io/reference/post_links">https://developers.short.io/reference/post_links</a>
</br>
### Tecnologias Utilizadas
[![Short.io](https://img.shields.io/badge/Short.io-404040?style=flat&logo=data:image/jpeg;base64,&logoColor=white)](#)
[![AMPScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/AMPScript-404040?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)](#)
[![API](https://img.shields.io/badge/API-404040?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)](#)
[![Salesforce Marketing Cloud](https://img.shields.io/badge/Salesforce%20Marketing%20Cloud-404040?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white)](#)


# UML do desenvolvimento
```mermaid
flowchart 

subgraph AMPScript
  
    userid(@userid)
    campanha(@campanha)
    destinocompleto(@destinocompleto)
    titulo(@titulo)
    destinocompleto --> originalURL
    titulo --> title
    userid --> tags
    campanha --> tags
  subgraph payload ["@payload - Json Parameter"]
      allowDuplicates
      domain
      originalURL
      title
      tags
  end
  headerkey(@headerKey)
  headerval(@headerVal)
  headerkey --> headers
  headerval --> headers
  payload -->body_params
  subgraph api ["Shot.io API"]
    body_params(Body Params)
    headers(Headers)
    body_params --> generate
    headers --> generate
    generate(Generate Link)
    response(Responses)
    generate --> response
  end
  shorturl(@shortURL)
  response --"RegExMatch(@response,shortURL)"--> shorturl
end
shorturl --> Message
subgraph Message["SMS Message"]
  
end

```
